fees.aiml: CSE (AI & ML) yearly fee is approximately ₹1,00,000
fees.ds: CSE (Data Science) yearly fee is approximately ₹1,00,000
fees.mech: Mechanical Engineering yearly fee is approximately ₹80,000
fees.civil: Civil Engineering yearly fee is approximately ₹75,000

hostel: Hostel facilities are available for both boys and girls with hygienic food, Wi-Fi, and 24/7 security.
bus: College buses operate on multiple routes covering Hyderabad and nearby areas. Bus fee depends on distance.

placements.highest_package: Highest package offered is around ₹12 LPA

sports: ACE Engineering College encourages sports with facilities for cricket, volleyball, badminton, and indoor games.
fest: ACE conducts technical fests, cultural events, and annual celebrations every year.
